name: Little Girl Dress up
description:
The cute baby Dora Smith is going on a vacation with her friends, she brings too many clothes and accessories, so she can’t choose the best outfit. Help your little girl look beautiful with the things she has.. Don’t let Dora wait more, start and show your fashion style right now! Enjoy it!

★★★Features★★★

★ Only in “Little Girl - Dress Up”: Enjoy two interesting mode
- Classic mode: Dress Little Girl up to be cute, sweet or style up to you. Tap and keep in 2 seconds, you can choose vary of backgrounds from gallery to suit outfit. You can pinch, zoom, rotate and move model and background and have the most beautiful photos.
- Time mode: Try your memory to make her look like the model to get the highest score
★ A lot of make-up styles.
★ Difference accessories: earrings, necklaces, and bracelets
★ Many cute hair styles
★ Pretty color clothes: outfits, dresses, T-shirts and shoes..
★ Take nice photos and share with people over Facebook, Twitter.. or save in gallery.
